remarks.format: ## Remarks 当发生未处理的异常时，由线程创建。A is created by a thread when an unhandled exception occurs. 包含 发生的。 contains the that occurred. ## Examples 下面的示例允许您 通过单击窗体来引发 `button1` 事件。The following example allows you to raise a event by clicking `button1` on a form. 该示例创建了两个类。The example creates two classes. `ErrorHandler`类创建窗体和引发事件的按钮。The `ErrorHandler` class creates the form and the button that raises the event. `CustomExceptionHandler`类提供处理异常的方法。The `CustomExceptionHandler` class provides the methods to handle the exception. 在 `Main` 类中 `ErrorHandler` ，代码将创建异常处理类的新实例，即的实例 `CustomExceptionHandler` 。In `Main` in the `ErrorHandler` class, the code creates a new instance of the exception handling class, that is, an instance of the `CustomExceptionHandler`. 然后，将该实例添加到事件中，并运行该应用程序。Then the instance is added to the event, and the application is run. 在 `OnThreadException` 类的方法中 `CustomExceptionHandler` ，该示例使用 `try...catch...finally` 语句来处理异常。In the `OnThreadException` method in the `CustomExceptionHandler` class, the example uses a `try...catch...finally` statement to process the exception. `ShowThreadExceptionDialog`方法创建要显示的消息，并将其显示在消息框中。The `ShowThreadExceptionDialog` method creates the message to display, and displays it in a message box.
